synopsis.text:
Megumi's brother, Yuu Shinozaki, is a passionate motorcycle enthusiast who feels trapped in a life dictated by the unyielding hands of a clock. His unconventional views create a rift between him and his family, teachers, and even his childhood sweetheart, Aoi. Feeling misunderstood, Yuu finds solace and understanding only in his motorcycle and his biker sister, Moe.

One day, following a particularly disheartening day at school, Yuu decides to break free from the monotony of his life. With Moe's friend Tetsuo lending a helping hand, Yuu embarks on a thrilling journey across Japan on his motorcycle, leaving behind his worries and the people who care about him.

As Yuu traverses the length of Japan, he undergoes a transformation, discovering a new sense of purpose by helping those he encounters along the way. His adventurous expedition takes an unexpected turn when he finds himself falling in love with a beautiful woman named Tomo after a serendipitous accident. Meanwhile, his sister Megumi and girlfriend Aoi anxiously await his return, unaware of the profound changes Yuu is experiencing on his journey of self-discovery and love.
